name: ultrasound
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] special sound waves used in such processes as examining organs inside the body and directing the route of submarines: They'll use ultrasound to monitor her ovaries. ultrasound scanning/imaging
[ C ] an ultrasound scan

Add to word list
Add to word list
sound waves that are higher than people can hear, esp. ones used to examine and treat medical problems: An ultrasound scan revealed tissue damage.
